quote: Eagles can fly higher than other birds, but a small sparrow can evade much better and has a better chance to survive, if falls off the height. (Sentence from my ebook, Tora-Bora mountains)
quote_letters: EAGLES CAN FLY HIGHER THAN OTHER BIRDS BUT A SMALL SPARROW CAN EVADE MUCH BETTER AND HAS A BETTER CHANCE TO SURVIVE IF FALLS OFF THE HEIGHT SENTENCE FROM MY EBOOK TORA-BORA MOUNTAINS
